alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 8:20PM CST until February 25 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 453.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday evening to a crest of 457.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 453.1 Mon 8 pm CST 454.8 456.5 457.0 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
